title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager reports the following error: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late, resulting in a failed JAR creation with an error message mentioning 'Unsaved Editors'5'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Press the 'Finish' button to initiate the JAR creation process.
3. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
